summary:
A rather strong companion found in Chidna Mine.
I just created this for some testing and thought, hey let\'s upload him to the nexus :D
descriptionHtml:
A rather strong argonian companion found in Chidna Mine.
I just created this for some testing and thought, hey let\'s upload him to the nexus :D
He\'s larger then most people he\'s 1.03 tall (shown in the pictures)
He is fully voiced with a default voice from Skyrim so it doesn\'t feel weird or something :D
 I named him Sam Henrikson, Sam; because Im not good at names and Henrikson; because henrikson means you\'re the son of henrik (old Norwegian stuff)
It should work on all launguages (but tell me if it doesn\'t)
He starts with dragonplate armor and a deadric greatsword :D

Tell me if you want him less op or with other equipment and i will make a new .ver
author: falloutforlife
